Name: objoid
Description: The OID of the object this security label pertains\n to

Name: classoid
Description: The OID of the system catalog this object appears\n in

Name: objsubid
Description: For a security label on a table column, this is the\n column number (the objoid and classoid refer to the table itself). For all other object types, this column is zero.

Name: provider
Description: The label provider associated with this label.

Name: label
Description: The security label applied to this object.
